column4: i have a few questions before i install ubuntu. 1 does it re format my harddrive 2 what format does it use because im am currently making backups on my external hdd which is in ntfs ?
it uses Ext4 by default, you will need 2 partitions to hold the OS
it can, or you can dual boot and it will format a portion of the space
the install media can do al the partitioning you need
